basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Highly skilled Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, proficient in front-end technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Vue.js, as well as back-end development using Node.js, Python, Express.js, and MongoDB. Experienced in developing user-friendly web applications with intuitive UI/UX designs, implementing server-side logic, database management, and integrating RESTful APIs and web services. Strong problem-solving skills, collaborative team player with experience in code reviews, Git version control, and contributing to software development lifecycle.

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Collaborated with development team to design, develop, and maintain full-stack web applications for AdsMedia retargeting platform using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and TypeScript.
highlights: Developed user-friendly web applications with intuitive UI/UX designs, architecting and implementing key dashboard and form components for campaign management using responsive design principles
Contributed to server-side logic and API integration to ensure smooth data flow and optimal performance across devices
Participated in team collaboration for system design, troubleshooting, and debugging to deliver high-quality software solutions

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led front-end development and back-end contributions in web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams including product managers and designers to implement innovative solutions.
highlights: Developed and refactored front-end of exam management platform using Vue.js and Vuetify, enhancing UI/UX and improving page load times by 25%
Implemented server-side logic using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for database management and RESTful API integration in web services
Conducted code reviews, participated in software development lifecycle, and utilized Git for version control while troubleshooting applications for optimal performance

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while developing automation tools to improve efficiency in a collaborative team environment.
highlights: Developed JavaScript-based automation tool (Otis) for form-filling and email generation, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and proactive approach
Enhanced communication and teamwork by interacting with diverse customers and participating in innovation initiatives

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Collaborated as a core member of a small development team to build the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform using Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript.
highlights: Functioned as the primary front-end developer and a contributing back-end developer, responsible for architecting and developing key dashboard and form components for campaign management
Implemented responsive design principles and ensured cross-browser compatibility, delivering a seamless user experience across all devices
Worked closely with the back-end team on system design and API integration to ensure smooth data flow and application functionality

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation, enhancing team efficiency and demonstrating problem-solving skills

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: Developed a full-stack social media web application using MERN stack, focusing on end-to-end development of user-friendly interfaces and server-side functionality.
highlights: Designed and developed dynamic front-end features using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for intuitive UI/UX
Implemented back-end server-side logic with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for database management and RESTful API integration

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: Engineered an AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection and blocking, utilizing front-end technologies and API integration.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Developed an extension for Nvidia Isaac Sim to control robots via natural language using Python back-end and OpenAI APIs for web services integration.
